game.name: PROFANA
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Profana is a Metroidvania centered around exploration and combat. Kill demons on a holy war while making sick looking combos!
